title: Reav3 Could you give us top ten of a requested for a VGU list in incoming Dev Blog?
body:
For those who have not known  before. This list is the biggest factor (but not only one) to determine which champ should brought on the table for rework. Currently we know only 4 of it. 

1. Yorick
2. Galio
3. Evelyn 
4. Urgot
(source: hhttp://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/08/red-post-collection-leblanc-update.html)

I think Warwick is surely one in this list (maybe number 5 or 6) so there are only 5 we haven't known yet. 
Reav3 could the team give us the rest?

replies.body:
A bit too late on that as the DevBLog is currently being localized. I likely wouldn't add that list anyway even if it wasn't though. 

The reason being that the list is constantly changing and I'm sot sure how useful it would be to post what the list is at any given moment in time. The Devblog would likely be referenced in the future, much like you have referenced my old post as the definitive list, even though it isn't.

For example, the list currently looks like this today:

1. Yorick
2. Urgot
3. Nunu
4. Warwick
5. Galio
6. Singed
7. Evelynn


It will likely look very different a month from now. This is why we generally look at trends overtime rather then what the list is at one particular point in time. When talking about updates we usually talk about the top 10-15 that appear in the top #10 a lot.

EDIT: Just to clarify in case people don't read the post this thread is referring to. This is the ever changing list of champions players think need a VGU the most based on our survey data we periodically send out to players.
NNOOOO my Pantheon is nowhere to be found

He's still very high on the list, according to Reav3.

> Just to clarify in case people don't read the post this thread is referring to. This is the ever changing list of champions players think need a VGU the most based on our survey data we periodically send out to players.

I know this. But lets be real. It is highly unlikely he is passing anyone on that list. Not impossible, but highly unlikely.

Eh, nothing we can do

DwarvenGiant has a point. It all depends on how much Riot is changing the game, and if the changes poses a negative effect on said champions, it needs to be updated.

Pantheon's fine the way he is... for now. Like Reav3 said, the list is constantly changing, so there's a chance that Pantheon might make it up in the higher list if his kit becomes as outdated as Warwick and Urgot.
You never know. :P
I took it a different way. I still get a year or more of playing Panth as I like him before he gets changed to something I may not like.
I thank you for your answer and the list. I'm very surprised even given a visual update back in 2014 players still want Singed to be reworked more than Panth and Swain.

But they also gave Urgot some QoL changes that none of the other options got. He got thr mana scaling on his W and the fear on his R.
Reav3 and Meddler have also stated that they'll be really shocked if Evelynn is not reworked in 2017, which is all but a confirmation. Given that roughly 3 come out per year, that's Warwick, Evelynn, and most likely Galio. Depending on when Warwick comes, there could be a fourth, which would be Urgot.
And also, this listing of Galio, Evelynn, and Urgot was given by Reav3 and Meddler *after* Yorick and Warwick were announced and were long in production, which means that they are the current tops of the list. Given that they never gave us a listing prior to this, we don't know where Warwick stood.

To the point about Ryze, he was a special case. They'd stated that he had already had partial work done last year, which included a completed model, before he got iceboxed for other work. So all they had to do on him was work out his animations and kit.

{{champion:19}} is currently being worked on, and since {{champion:83}}  is almost finished (PBE), his team is probably transitioned to the next update. Current community speculation points to {{champion:6}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:28}} as the next major 3 options.

We also have to keep in mind the Roster Update team is working on Assassins. The candidates getting larger work are {{champion:55}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:91}} . There will also be some smaller scope work on other assassins, but we do not know who that will be yet. Community speculation points to {{champion:105}} {{champion:121}} . When going over other Assassin candidates, it was pointed out that there will be some work done to the Stealth system and {{champion:84}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:35}} need VGUs instead of being part of the Roster Update. 

Other champions farther down the list for VGUs probably include {{champion:31}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:266}} .

We can also count on a Roster Update next mid-season probably, which is going to most likely focus on Divers or Tanks.
